1 var Util = require('util');
  2 var Client = require('./Client');
  3 var Constants = require('./Constants');
  4 var RestParameterValidator = require('./RestParameterValidator');
  5 
  6 /**
  7  * Creates an instance of RestClient.
  8  *
  9  * @constructor
 10  * @this {RestClient}
 11  * @param {String} consumerKey OAuth consumer key.
 12  * @param {String} consumerSecret OAuth consumer secret.
 13  * @param {String} token OAuth token.
 14  * @param {String} tokenSecret OAuth token secret.
 15  */
 16 var RestClient = function(consumerKey, consumerSecret, token, tokenSecret)
 17 {
 18     Client.call(this, consumerKey, consumerSecret, token, tokenSecret);
 19 
 20     this._apiBaseUrlString = Constants.RestApiBaseURLString;
 21     this._apiVersion = Constants.RestApiVersion;
 22     this._validator = new RestParameterValidator();
 23 };
 24 
 25 Util.inherits(RestClient, Client);
 26 
 27 // Timelines
 28 //
 29 // Timelines are collections of Tweets, ordered with the most recent first.
 30 
 31 /**
 32  * Returns the 20 most recent tweets (including retweets), posted by the authenticated user and the user they follow.
 33  *
 34  * For information on acceptable parameters see the official <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1/get/statuses/home_timeline">Twitter documenation</a>.
 35  *
 36  * @this {RestClient}
 37  * @param {Dictionary} parameters
 38  * @param {Function} callback The callback function.
 39  */
 40 RestClient.prototype.statusesHomeTimeline = function(parameters, callback)
 41 {
 42     this._validator.validateContributorDetails(parameters);
 43     this._validator.validateCount(parameters);
 44     this._validator.validateExcludeReplies(parameters);
 45     this._validator.validateIncludeEntities(parameters);
 46     this._validator.validateIncludeRetweets(parameters);
 47     this._validator.validateMaxId(parameters);
 48     this._validator.validatePage(parameters);
 49     this._validator.validateSinceId(parameters);
 50     this._validator.validateTrimUser(parameters);
 51 
 52 	this._createGetRequest('statuses/home_timeline', 'json', parameters, callback);
 53 };
 54 
 55 /**
 56  *
 57  *
 58  * For information on acceptable parameters see the official <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1/get/statuses/mentions">Twitter documentation</a>.
 59  *
 60  * @this {RestClient}
 61  * @param {Dictionary} parameters
 62  * @param {Function} callback The callback function.
 63  */
 64 RestClient.prototype.statusesMentions = function(parameters, callback)
 65 {
 66     this._validator.validateContributorDetails(parameters);
 67     this._validator.validateCount(parameters);
 68     this._validator.validateExcludeReplies(parameters);
 69     this._validator.validateIncludeEntities(parameters);
 70     this._validator.validateIncludeRetweets(parameters);
 71     this._validator.validateMaxId(parameters);
 72     this._validator.validatePage(parameters);
 73     this._validator.validateSinceId(parameters);
 74     this._validator.validateTrimUser(parameters);
 75 
 76     this._createGetRequest('statuses/mentions', 'json', parameters, callback);
 77 };
 78

 84  *
 85  * @this {RestClient}
 86  * @param {Dictionary} parameters
 87  * @param {Function} callback The callback function.
 88  */
 89 RestClient.prototype.statusesPublicTimeline = function(parameters, callback)
 90 {
 91     this._validator.validateCount(parameters);
 92     this._validator.validateIncludeEntities(parameters);
 93     this._validator.validateTrimUser(parameters);
 94 
 95     this._createGetRequest('statuses/public_timeline', 'json', parameters, callback);
 96 };

119 /**
120  *
121  *
122  * For information on acceptable parameters see the official <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1/get/statuses/retweeted_by_user">Twitter documenation</a>.
123  *
124  * @this {RestClient}
125  * @param {Dictionary} parameters
126  * @param {Function} callback The callback function.
127  */
128 RestClient.prototype.statusesRetweetedByUser = function(parameters, callback)
129 {
130     this._validator.validateCount(parameters);
131     this._validator.validateIncludeEntities(parameters);
132     this._validator.validateMaxId(parameters);
133     this._validator.validatePage(parameters);
134     this._validator.validateScreenName(parameters);
135     this._validator.validateSinceId(parameters);
136     this._validator.validateTrimUser(parameters);
137     this._validator.validateUserId(parameters);
138 
139     this._createGetRequest('statuses/retweeted_by_user', 'json', parameters, callback);
140 };

226     this._validator.validateScreenName(parameters);
227     this._validator.validateTrimUser(parameters);
228     this._validator.validateUserId(parameters);
229

231 };
